name: Banjo Kazooie: Jiggies of Time
description:
THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE - THE JIGGIES OF TIME is a full Banjo Kazooie mod in the world of Zelda: Ocarina of Time made by Mark Kurko.

DOWNLOAD PATCH 1.3 (UPDATED December 6th 2020) just drop your "Banjo-Kazooie (U) [!]"
https://patch.wedarobi.com/bk_jiggies_of_time
